name: MousePong
description:
A pong game with more complex controls.

____________________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

First Player:
RMB - Move Down
RMB + LMB (Pressed at the same time) - Move Up

Second Player:
DOWN ARROW - Move Down
DOWN ARROW + LEFT ARROW - Move up

+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+

Planned Features:

    -Singleplayer Mode

    -Better Control Over The Ball's Direction
